oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Snow scene along Church Street, looking east towards Fifth Avenue, Nashville, Tennessee, 2016 January 23
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The snow-covered urban landscape along Church Street, Nashville, facing east towards Fifth Avenue, in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, January 23rd, 2016. This was the biggest snow in more than a decade to blanket Middle Tennessee with several inches of snow. Eight inches of snowfall was reported in Nashville, making it an historic weather event. Among the buildings pictured in this set of photos are the AT&T Building, SunTrust, Ryman Auditorium, Regions Bank, 505 Church Street skyscraper construction site, Veridian, 4th and Church Building, Central Church of Christ, Schermerhorn Symphony Center, Fifth Third Center, Paramore O, Downtown Presbyterian Church, and Puckett’s Grocery & Restaurant. Forms part of the Leanne Garland Photograph Collection. 1 digital photograph.
